title: Find Oversold Stocks (5 minutes)
subtitle: Use RSI to quickly surface oversold names on your watchlist.
goal: Get a list of oversold candidates using hourly RSI < 30.

steps.rationale: Larger intraday bars reduce noise for beginners.

outputs: List of matches { symbol, ts, value }
avoid_when: Major news or very low liquidity
caveats: RSI can stay oversold in strong downtrends
beginner_summary: Screen your watchlist for hourly RSI < 30 to find oversold names.
